summary: "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince" is a 2009 fantasy movie directed by David Yates, based on J.K. Rowling's book. It's the sixth Harry Potter film, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, and Emma Watson. The story follows Harry's sixth year at Hogwarts, where he finds a magical textbook, falls in love, and tries to uncover a memory that can help defeat Lord Voldemort. The movie was very expensive to make but received positive reviews and made a lot of money. It was nominated for several awards and led to the final installment, "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows."
title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)
